name: rightscale_services_tools/

vpc_nat/other_instance_id.description: The instance ID of the instance to monitor.
vpc_nat/other_instance_id.display_name: Instance ID of other NAT HA Instance

vpc_nat/route_id.description: The route ID of the VPC route where the this instance is associated.
vpc_nat/route_id.display_name: VPC Route ID of VPC Route Table

vpc_nat/aws_account_secret.description: Use your AWS secret access key (e.g., cred:AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY)

vpc_nat/aws_account_id.description: Use your Amazon access key ID (e.g., cred:AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID)

vpc_nat/other_route_id.description: The routetable Id of the VPC route where the other instance is associated.

recipes.rightscale_services_tools::vpc-nat-ha: Configures NAT Monitor for NAT instance HA.
recipes.rightscale_services_tools::vpc-nat: Enable AWS VPC NAT instance ipforwarding and iptables

long_description:
Description
===========
A collection of useful tools brought to you buy the RightScale Services Team, make sure and check libraries, definitions, resources, and providers. There will be tools in each of those. 

Requirements
============

Attributes
==========

Usage
=====
Recipes-
  vpc-nat:  Configures ip forwarding and iptables for AWS VPC NAT host
  vpc-nat-ha:  Setup monitoring another NAT instance for HA setup

Definitions -
  gen_profile_script

Libraries - 
  has_connectivity(ip,port,proto = "tcp")

  check_connectivity(host,port,message,timeout=60)
